feed.title: PeaNUT Releases

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed updates not showing in footer

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v4.0.1...v4.0.2

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Create translation.json for Romanian by @StoicaRemus in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/114
  • Configure influx interval in UI by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/112
  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/117
  • Better settings types by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/115

New Contributors

  • @StoicaRemus made their first contribution in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/114

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v4.0.2...v4.1.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New Grid by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/118
  • react 19 by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/120

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v4.1.0...v4.2.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/122
  • Unique names only by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/121
  • Bump nanoid from 3.3.7 to 3.3.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/123
  • Fix README spelling by @duongdev in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/124
  • Fix for new setups not being redirected to the login page by @Brandawg93

New Contributors

  • @duongdev made their first contribution in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/124

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v4.2.0...v4.2.1

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/128
  • doc: update homepage README link by @TO19 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/129
  • re-use existing connection on getData endpoint by @rmlamarche in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/130
  • Add API endpoint for executing commands on devices and related tests by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/127

New Contributors

  • @TO19 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/129
  • @rmlamarche made their first contribution in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/130

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v4.2.1...v4.3.0
